Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only meets but exceeds industry standards, providing unparalleled performance and durability. Considering its excellence, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. However, to make it accessible to you, I'm offering it at an introductory price of $95. This is a special opportunity for you to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
